screen-shot-2020-03-18-at-12.47.44-pm.pn.caption: The image features the exhibition space where there are large panels hanging in a neutral, cream color and blue circles. The shadow on the back wall and the left-hand side of the floor reflect the installation. On the back wall is a hanging painting as well

intervals01.jpg.caption: This is a close-up detail image of a piece in the show. The painting includes collaged materials that protrude from under the canvas with a red clay hue. One area at the top of the painting features writing in black ink.
